lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Across the state on the Gulf coast where there are heavy concentrations of retired persons, Robert Lee of Investment Management and Research Incorporated said there were "a lot of serious losses out there."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The uniqueness of south Florida investors was easy to see in brokerage offices around Miami, where the average age of the crowds watching the Big Board quotations flash by on Tuesday was retirement and beyond.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "I don't know of any demographic studies, but we certainly have the highest number of elderly active investors," said Marshall Moore, a vice president of AmeriFirst Securities Corporation in Miami.
